movies.title: Matrix
movies.summary: "The Matrix" is a science fiction film written and directed by the Wachowskis, released in 1999. The story revolves around a computer hacker named Neo, played by Keanu Reeves, who discovers that the world he knows is an illusion created by intelligent machines that have enslaved humanity. Neo joins a group of rebels led by Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne) and Trinity (Carrie-Anne Moss) to challenge the oppressive rule of the machines.
